name: American Pachinko
description:
The Pachinko game nobody asked for! Made by an American who once played pachinko and who does not understand the original rules! Play the tribe without the chance to win money in a true test of skill! Try to target balls landing in the "jackpot" areas to win a spin on the slot machine. One or more cherries or three of a kind win more balls!

How to play:

  • Left and Right click on the red handles on the bottom change parameters.
  • Left Handle: Increase (right click) or Decrease (left click) the frequency balls are shot out.
  • Right Handle: Increase (left click) or Decrease (right click) the initial speed of the balls.

Credit for art: https://payhip.com/INDIEGAMEASSETS
